comprehensive_overview: sparsehash is a C++ library that provides several hash-map implementations. These implementations are designed to be very space-efficient, but still allow fast lookups.
core_features: 1. Provides hash-map implementations. 2. Designed to be space-efficient. 3. Allows fast lookups. 4. Supports several hash-map types such as sparse_hash_map, dense_hash_map, and more.
